game.name: Somnolence
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Wake up in a dream research project gone wrong. As the line between consciousness, memory, and code dissolves, the system watches you. Which is more dangerous — staying asleep, or waking up?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Wake up in a dream research project gone wrong. As the line between consciousness, memory, and code dissolves, the system watches you. Which is more dangerous — staying asleep, or waking up?
